Bridlington Contest (Section 1) 0 Test Piece Contest

None
Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
The Spa, Bridlington, East Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £16, 3rd £12, 4th £8, 5th £6. Source The Musical Progress and Mail August 1931. 6 bands competed
Oct. 12, 2012, 4:02 p.m. Dec. 16, 2018, 10:59 a.m.
1 Spenborough Victoria Luther Dyson
2 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Nathan Sidebottom
3 Bentley Colliery W. Wormald
4 Shepherd Group Band H. Lambert
5 Yorkshire Evening Post Band W. Bedford
6 Carlton Temperance J. E. Elliott
